subject: Tests (Drug Use)
Football
Human Growth Hormone
Steroids
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Adolpho Birch, who oversees the N.F.L.’s drug-testing program, said he is confident game-day testing would not be disruptive.
snippet: Adolpho Birch, who oversees the N.F.L.’s drug-testing program, said he is confident game-day testing would not be disruptive.
